title: Her Billionaire Mistake
description: Kisses may happen...But this is one mistake she won't get over.In her efforts to reunite her grandmother with her first love, Brooklyn stumbles into Asher. He’s mysterious and funny and out to change her home town.She won’t have it.But she wants him.You’ll love this sweet billionaire romance because life is messy but everyone knows love can overcome.Pick up your copy today!
author: Lucy McConnell
